channel.title: Portfolio on Bryture
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolio on Bryture

item.title: USB Conference Camera
item.description: Project Requirements It requires a USB Camera solution supporting UVC (USB Video Class) and UAC (USB Audio Class) with Camera Sensor (with HDR/WDR capability).

item.title: Face Follower Gadget
item.description: Project Requirements It requires face detection to drive a motor to follow the direction where faces locates.
